title: Good Time Summertime Docket Clearin'
description: Judge Hodgman is assisted by Summertime Bailiff Monte Belmonte, taking on questions of broccoli-chomping, accidental raccoonslaughter, game night disputes, and the best construction of jokes.
author: shows@maximumfun.org (Jesse Thorn)
